text: Victor Vinícius Coelho dos Santos (also known as Vitinho; born 9 October 1993) is a Brazilian professional association football player. He currently plays for Flamengo. == Career == He has played for the Brazilian club, Botafogo de Futebol e Regatas. In the 2013 season, he scored 4 goals in 16 Série A games. Vitinho signed a 5-year contract with PFC CSKA Moscow on 2 September 2013. He was usually just used as a substitute. Botafogo was interested in loaning Vitinho back to the club. On 16 January 2015, Vitinho joined Sport Club Internacional on a one-year loan deal. The loan was extended to the end of 2016. He also extended his contract with CSKA Moscow to 2020. He returned to CSKA Moscow in January 2017. He made two appearances with the Brazilian Olympic team in 2012. == Honours == ;Botafogo *Campeonato Carioca (1): 2013 ;CSKA * Russian Premier League (1): 2013–14 * Russian Super Cup (1): 2014 ;Internacional *Campeonato Gaúcho (2): 2015, 2016 == References == == Other websites == * Vitinho at Soccerway Category:1993 births Category:Living people Category:Footballers from Rio de Janeiro
title: Vitinho (footballer, born October 1993)
